description:
Sentinel 1 GRD Sigma0, mosaic of all descending relative orbits. Backscatter values are provided as natural number, not in decibel. Provided by Terrascope.

 Use [this viewer](https://viewer.terrascope.be/?language=en&bbox=2.8531494643539195,50.29627033037724,6.36877446435392,51.454777120718546&overlay=true&bgLayer=Satellite&date=2020-10-15&layer=CGS_S1_GRD_SIGMA0) to explore the data.
title: Sentinel 1 GRD Sigma0 product, VH, VV and angle.
